bug.title: Fuel economy stats not calculated when all fillups was "not to the top"
bug.description:
``` What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. enter few fillups, each mark as partial 2. go to stats
Expected behavior: got calculated "Fuel economy" stats
Actual behavior: got: Average NaN L/100 km Worst -10000,00 L/100 km best 10000,0 L/100 km
also "Cost per distance" is somewhat strange Average: infinity
Mileage version: 3.1.1 Android version: cm7.2 Device: sgs2 ```
Original issue reported on code.google.com by `sszym...@gmail.com` on 18 Jun 2012 at 5:05
